title: 1.22 Deuteronomy II: The Death of Moses
itunes:title: Deuteronomy II: The Death of Moses
description: In the last half of Deuteronomy, Moses lays out laws on family matters. I compare these to the Mesopotamian law codes. He sets out a splendid set of curses on those would disobey, modeled on Assyrian curses. Polytheism sneaks through a few times.
content:encoded: In the last half of Deuteronomy, Moses lays out laws on family matters. I compare these to the Mesopotamian law codes. He sets out a splendid set of curses on those would disobey, modeled on Assyrian curses. Polytheism sneaks through a few times.
itunes:subtitle: Moses prepares to die, laying down laws on family matters, and blessing the 12 tribes.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
